mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum as rnum, c.* FROM (SELECT a.no ,b.name as programName ,SUBSTR(a.reg_date,1,10) as regDate ,a.whitening_score as whiteningScore ,a.wrinkle_score as whinkleScore ,a.elastic_score as elasticScore ,a.moisture_score as moistureScore ,a.acne_score as acneScore ,a.average_score as averageScore FROM VISIT a, PROGRAM b WHERE a.user_no = #{userNo } AND a.program_no = b.no ORDER BY a.REG_DATE desc , a.no desc) c ) WHERE rownum<=5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum as rnum, c.* FROM (SELECT a.no ,b.name as programName ,SUBSTR(a.reg_date,1,10) as regDate ,a.whitening_score as whiteningScore ,a.wrinkle_score as whinkleScore ,a.elastic_score as elasticScore ,a.moisture_score as moistureScore ,a.acne_score as acneScore ,a.average_score as averageScore ,d.path as path ,d.sava_name as saveName ,a.memo as memo FROM VISIT a, PROGRAM b, F_VISIT d WHERE a.user_no = #{userNo } AND a.program_no = b.no AND a.image_no = d.no ORDER BY a.REG_DATE desc , a.no desc) c ) WHERE ( #{currentPage } - 1 ) * #{pageRecords } + 1 <= rnum and rnum <= #{currentPage } * #{pageRecords }
SELECT count(*) FROM VISIT WHERE user_no = #{userNo }
